About 362-366 Commonwealth Ave Unit 4C

Experience the epitome of Back Bay living in this charming and updated one-bedroom home situated on scenic Commonwealth Avenue. Step into the elevator and ascend to discover a space adorned with 10â€™ curved ceilings, original moldings, and stunning hardwood floors throughout. The open kitchen boasts granite counters and a full set of stainless steel appliances. With its spacious floor plan, there's ample room for dining, lounging, and a home office. The bedroom easily accommodates a king-size bed and offers generous closet space. Live in luxury with two elevators and a separate mailroom. Enjoy city views from the common roof deck. Conveniently located near Newbury St, Copley Mall, Trader Joe's, and the T. Pet-friendly and parking available nearby.
